title: Your Path to Structural Big Data Search
abstract: Gajanan Chinchwadkar describes the awesome power of structural indexing and search in MarkLogic Server, now and in the future. In this talk he will explain how path and field indexes let you target your search to a specific part of a document's structure. If you are a new user exploring MarkLogic Server as a powerful Big Data Search engine, you should not miss this talk. If you are an experienced MarkLogic developer or administrator, this talk will expose some features you may not have used yet, and update you on current engineering work and future capabilities.
